name: EC2
description: Elastic Compute Cloud — virtual servers in the cloud.
backend: Simulates EC2 instance state checks and CloudWatch alarms for CPU utilization and scheduled events.

name: S3
description: Simple Storage Service — scalable object storage.
backend: Tracks bucket accessibility, replication status, and object-level request latency.

name: DynamoDB
backend: Simulates throughput and latency checks against provisioned table capacity.

name: Lambda
description: Serverless compute engine for event-driven workloads.
backend: Monitors invocation errors, cold start duration, and concurrency limits.

name: CloudWatch
backend: Simulates metric ingestion failures and delayed alarm notifications.
